column3: ne ndaansa no a David na ne mbarimba no baa Ziklag no
column4: na Amalekfo ekotua pomu afamu no

column2: "na wɔafa mbaa na dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara
column3: nkakraba na akɛse nyina ndɔmmum: woennku obiara

column2: "Na aber a David na ne mbarimba no bodur kurow no mu no
column3: nna
column5: wɔdze gya ahyew no; na wɔafa hɔn yernom

column2: "Nna David na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no maa hɔn ndze do sui araa kodur dɛ wonnyi ahom bio dɛ wɔdze bosu."
"Na David ne yernom beenu no so wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum
column3: Jezreelnyi Ahinoam

column2: "Na David no ho hiahiaa no kɛsenara; osiandɛ nkorɔfo no kaa dɛ wobesiw no abo
column3: osiandɛ nkorɔfo no nyinara hɔn kra no werɛ howee
column4: ɔbarimba biara wɔ ne mbabanyin na ne mbabaa ntsi: na David dze
column5: ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn mu."

column3: Ahimelek ne ba no
column6: fa asɔfotar no brɛ me ha. Na Abiathar dze asɔfotar no brɛɛ David wɔ hɔ."

column3: Sɛ mitsiw dɔm yi a
column4: ana mobɔto hɔn a? Na obuaa no dɛ
column5: Tsiw hɔn: na ampaara dɛ ebɔto hɔn
column6: na ɔyɛ dɛn ara a wo nsa bɛka hɔn nyinara bio."

column3: ɔno na mbarimba ahaesia a wɔka no ho no
column5: mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaa ekyir no siankae no."

column3: ɔno na mbarimba ahaanan: na ahaenu a wɔatotɔ bahaw dodow dɛ wonnkotum etwa ɔwora Besor no siankaa ekyir:"

column2: "na wokohun Egyptnyi bi wɔ haban mu
column3: na wɔdze no brɛɛ David
column4: na wɔmaa no edziban ma odzii; na wɔmaa no nsu ma ɔnomee:"

column2: "na wɔmaa no adɔmba etɔw no ho kakra
column3: na esikyireamba esiaw ebien; na odzii no
column4: no sunsum sanee baa no mu bio: osiandɛ onndzii edziban biara

column3: Ɔwo yɛ woana nedze
column4: na henfa na ifi? Na obuaa dɛ
column6: Amaleknyi bi n’akowaa; na mo wura daan me gyae
column7: osiandɛ ndɛ ndaansa na yarba kaa me."

column3: na dza ɔyɛ Juda dze no
column4: na Kaleb no pomu afamu; na yɛdze gya hyeew Ziklag."

column3: Ana edze me besian akɔ dɔm yi nkyɛn a? Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Fa Nyame ka ntam kyerɛ me dɛ innkoku me
column5: nkyii so innkeyi me ahyɛ mo wura nsa
column6: na medze wo besian makɔ dɔm yi nkyɛn."

column3: nna hwɛ
column7: osian asadze pii a wɔakɛfa no wɔ Filistiafo asaase do
column8: na Juda asaase do no nyinara ntsi."

column2: "Na David fitsi adansaber no kunkum hɔn araa dze kodur n’adzekyee no ewimbir: na hɔn mu nyimpa biara emmfi nsa
column3: gyedɛ mberantsɛ ahaanan a wɔkoko efumpɔnkɔ do guanee no."

column2: "Na David gyee dza Amalekfo kɛfae no nyinara bio: na David gyee ne yernom beenu no."

column3: kakraba o
column8: adze biara a wɔfae o: David dze ne nyinara sanee bae."

column2: "Na David faa nguan na anantwi no nyinara
column3: dza wɔkaa hɔn dzii mbowa nkaa no enyim no

column2: "Na David baa mbarimba ahaenu no a wɔtotɔɔ bahaw ma woenntum annka David do no a wɔmaa wɔtsenaa ɔwora Besor ho no
column3: hɔn nkyɛn: na wosii mu kehyiaa David na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no kwan: na David bɛɛn nkorɔfo no okyiaa hɔn."

column2: "Nna hɔn a wɔnye David kɔree no hɔn mu nyimpa bɔn
column3: na akwasampafo no see dɛ
column5: yɛnnkɛma hɔn asadze a yɛakɛgye yi mu biara
column6: gyedɛ nyimpa biara ne yer na ne mba
column7: ama wɔaahwɛ hɔn nye hɔn akɔ."

column3: Mma hom nnyɛ dɛm
column5: wɔ dza EWURADZE dze ama hɛn no ho
column7: na oeyi dɔm a wɔbaa hɛn do no ahyɛ hɛn nsa."

column2: "Woana na obetsie hom wɔ asɛm yi mu? Na mbrɛ nyia ɔkɔ akono ne kyɛpɛn tse no
column3: dɛmara so na nyia ɔtsena ndzɛmba ho ne kyɛpɛn tse: wɔnkyɛ no pɛrpɛr."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ofitsi da no ara dze rokɔ no
column3: ɔdze too hɔ yɛɛ ahyɛdze na mbra maa Israel
ɔsomae ma wɔdze asadze no bi kɛmaa Juda mpanyimfo a wɔyɛ ne mfɛfo no dɛ
column5: EWURADZE n’atamfo asadze mu nhyira a wɔdze rebrɛ hom nye yi;"

column3: na hɔn a wɔwɔ Ramot pomu afamu
na hɔn a wɔwɔ Sifmot
na hɔn a wɔwɔ Jerameelfo nkurow mu
column4: na hɔn a wɔwɔ Kenfo nkurow mu;"

column3: na hɔn a wɔwɔ Kor-asan
na mbeambea nyinara a David nankasa nye ne nyimpa kyinkyinii no hɔ."
